data.meta_description: Welcome to Small Talk, a âslice-of-lifeâ podcast where we talk about... well, anything and everything!
data.text:
My Human Rant. The Ranting of a Lunatic. I discuss my upcoming album and a concept in which an alternate Earth consists of alternate political and societal systems for North America. Fun times.Â

Pre-save the album here: https://untd.io/m/6205890d8b475a48712ad341Â

Hosted by Isaac Netherton (@isaacnethertonn)Â

Make sure to rate and review this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, etc. It's appreciated!

Drew Running comes to discuss his newest upcoming project, The Sundown King, the newest Dudes and Their Guys album "Valentine's Day" and its songs, and the NFL playoffs. It's a good time!

Guest Host: Drew Running (@drewrunning; @sundownking)

Hosted by Isaac Netherton (@isaacnethertonn)

Make sure to rate and review this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, etc. It's appreciated!

In this year's opener episode, I discuss the unethical practice of "voluntourism" (a portmanteau of "volunteer" and "tourism"), my very opinionated thoughts on immigration in the US, and my new favorite band, Sammy Rae and The Friends!

written, produced, & hosted by Isaac Netherton (@isaacnethertonn)

Make sure to rate and review this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, etc. It's appreciated!

Hello, and welcome to Small Talk, a slice-of-life podcast where we talking about anything and everything! My name is Isaac, and I hope you enjoy!

What a year it has been! Various dreams have come true with this podcast, and I hope y'all have had just as much fun as I have! So, I will see you all next year (aka, next week XD), and hope you all have a Happy Holiday!

written, produced, & hosted by Isaac Netherton (@isaacnethertonn)

Make sure to rate and review this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, etc. It's appreciated!

Your Best Friend's Favorite Band (so... me, since I'm your best friend, and he's my favorite band) joins today to discuss his music, his style, the way music connects us, and of course, the little things we talk about that makes this "Small Talk!"Â

guest host: Your Best Friend's Favorite Band (@yourbestfriendsfavoriteband)Â

written, produced, & hosted by Isaac Netherton (@isaacnethertonn)Â

Make sure to rate and review this podcast on Apple Podcasts, Google Podcasts, etc. It's appreciated!Â
